Package Model

Class SpecialVM

java.lang.Object
Model.VendingMachine
Model.SpecialVM
public class SpecialVM extends VendingMachine
The Model.SpecialVM class is a child class of the Model.VendingMachine class. It inherits all of its parents attributes and methods. An object of this class can accept a combination of items that can result in the creation of special products based on the input

      public BankNotes BuyCustom(BankNotes userMoney, int[] nQtyChoice)
      BuyCustom method allows the user to input multiple items and create a special product based on the combination of items that the user inputs and subtracts from their money accordingly
      Overrides:
      BuyCustom in class VendingMachine
      Parameters:
      userMoney - is the amount of money the user has inserted
      nQtyChoice - is the amount of each item inserted by the user
